document_data.name: Arbas
document_data.mainbody: King '''Arbas''' "the Black Usuper" was an interloper who briefly seized the throne of [[Amn]] in the 7{{th}} century.
document_data.Relationships: Arbas was married to [[Leluia Torlath]], the only daughter of King [[Brinnaq Torlath I]].
document_data.History: After the death of King Brinnaq I in [[694 DR]], Arbas set about killing all the male [[Torlath]]s in Amn and wiped out most of the royal family by [[696 DR]], including newly-crowned King [[Esmel Torlath IV|Esmel IV]] and his baby son [[Esmar Torlath|Esmar]]. Arbas took the crown of Amn for himself, but his reign ended the next year when the surviving Torlath heir [[Jhanos Torlath I|Jhanos I]] returned and slew him, reclaiming the throne for his family.
